page.title: 06THE CHURCHES
page.content: {St.Mary's Parish Church}is combined with the churches of Bossington, Mottisfont in a{United Benefice}under the Rector of Broughton, the Revd.David Howe, who lives in the New Rectory just off the High Street. {Broughton Baptist Church}has just joined with the churches of Lockerley, Stockbridge and Wallop in the{"Test {Valley Baptist Fellowship"}under the pastoral oversight of the Revd.Dennis Hallas, whose services of Ordination and Induction took place on 20th July, 1985. Mr.and Mrs.Hallas live in The Manse in Dixons Lane. This is a new form of Ministry for the Baptist Church which bears interesting parallels with the Church of England's united benefices in rural areas. {The Methodist Church}closed some years ago and is being converted into houses
